title: Origin Theory Development and Application Workshop for Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Social studies integrated curriculum incorporating theory development and practical activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Can explain the definition and significance of origin theories in instructional design
Can develop two or more origin theories suitable for social studies contexts
Can analyze limitations of existing import theories and propose alternative solutions
Teams can propose application methods for origin theories in learning experience design
Formative assessment can provide feedback on peers' theoretical development processes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
